channel.title: Posts on Eugene Dobrovolsky
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Eugene Dobrovolsky

item.title: My workflow
item.description: This post is largely about Product Design. If you are not sure what it is exactly, Eric Eriksson has your back with What is Product Design?. In a sentence, it’s about understanding the problem, designing a solution, shipping it and iterating until it solves the problem. It’s quite brief, so, in a way, it is just another boring sketches and mockups iteration article of which there’s a good number on Medium.
